alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 2:49AM PST until December 09 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Worley, Kellogg, Lookout Pass, Davenport, Mullan, Coeur d`Alene, Airway Heights, Fourth Of July Pass, Downtown Spokane, Spokane Valley, Post Falls, Rockford, Pinehurst, St. Maries, Cheney, Wallace, Fairfield, Hayden, Osburn, Dobson Pass, and Fernwood. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
